title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: A classic French stew with beef braised in red wine with vegetables and herbs.

title: Pad Thai
summary: A popular Thai stir-fried noodle dish with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and peanuts.

title: Mediterranean Salmon
summary: Fresh salmon fillet baked with olives, tomatoes, and Mediterranean herbs.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
summary: Decadent individual chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center.
